name: Hey! A Loot Box!
description:
*The game doesn't run on some Chrome browsers, so if that is the case, do go to the bottom and download the executable to try the game!* (Also on chrome you have to tick "Allow popup" for the download button to shoot you through to the google drive.) *ALSO THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSIONS DIMENSIONS ARE ALL WRONG*

#NotGDC

This is a game made in seven days through [Not going to GDC game jam]! It’s been fun! :D

Hey! A Loot box!  Is a sidescroller tower defense game set in some god forbidden game world.

Play as a little treasure chest, just trying to defend his innocent body from the dirty goblins and their filthy hands. Learn to keep the goblins away and kindly dead by means of mundane soldiers equipped with legendary gears from OTHER triple A ga… universes, other worlds!

How to play

It’s all arrow keys!

Download the game below if you are not hearing sound or are experiencing errors!

Left and right for movement, up and down to climb ladders, move past items to pick them up and head out the gate to give the item to a soldier.

Try to figure out which item should be given to which soldier in line because their stats vary!

Credits

The Codings, the lines that intertwine this world and all the nifty tricks were pulled by the helpful and hard working Aaron Voymas!

All things audio that soothe your heart and tickle your brains are brought to you by the enthusiastic Joshua Mallard! 

The clumsiest four frame animations you’ve ever seen and the broken art style through weapons to backgounds were dragged into this world by Tei Taeyoung Kim!

And the other #NotGDC discord people who were throwing knowledge away left and right up and down.

Thank you!!
